title: NASA and Nichelle Nichols
description: Famous for her role as Star Trek's Uhura, Nichelle Nichols discusses in part 2 of her interview how she also played a vital role in influencing the modern era of NASA.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
